message.body: Hey girl! How much help do you need on Sunday's shoot for art direction you think? I'm trying to minimize the call sheet.
Heyyy sorry just realized I never replied to this. I won't be there on set but one art director and two PAs will be there that should be good!
And by two PAs I mean two art assistants
U won't be there at all this weekend?

I won't be on set at all *-* I told Kazuki before I signed up for Lotus. I've been talking with Ayesha and ecugal and I'm meeting with them before each weekend to show them exactly how the set should look like with props and decorations we have :)
